Reviews.Title: Camera and tripod are nice!
Reviews.Author: Suzy L
Reviews.Content: So, I bought this for the T3i body and was happy with the delivery time.  However, the other extras are of debatable quality.  The bag is not at all what is pictured in the picture itself but it will do.  The 46" tripod was nice but i think I much would have rather just bought the body by itself and bought all the other things separately that were more to my taste.  Overall though... this is a pretty decent starter kit.

ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera (Body Only) 16GB Package
